```{r setup-0}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Artificial data, 1

```{r artificial-1}
n <- 500

b0 <- 20
b1 <- 0.5
b2 <- 5
x1 <- runif(n, 10, 30)
epsilon1 <- 50*rnorm(n)
y1 <- b0 + b1*x1 + b2*x1^2 + epsilon1
e1 <- resid(lm(y1~x1))
artificial_1 <- data.frame(x1, y1, e1)
head(artificial_1)
```

## Artificial data, 2

```{r artificial-2}
b0 <- 20
b1 <- 50
x2 <- x1
epsilon2 <- 2*(x2-9)*runif(n,-1, 1)
y2 <- b0 + b1*x2 + epsilon2
e2 <- resid(lm(y2~x2))
artificial_2 <- data.frame(x2, y2, e2)
```

```{r artificial-3}
b0 <- 20
b1 <- 50
x3 <- 10 + 15*rbeta(n, 10, 10) + 10*(runif(n) > 0.5)
epsilon3 <- rnorm(n, 0, 50)
y3 <- b0 + b1*x3 + epsilon3
e3 <- resid(lm(y3~x3))
artificial_3 <- data.frame(x3, y3, e3)
```

```{r save}
save(
	artificial_1, 
	artificial_2, 
	artificial_3, 
	file="../data/module06.RData")
```
